description.value:
Duration 1 minute

Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}

You rend the area ahead of you to its very core, making creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] within 90 feet of you writhe in agony as you slice right through them. Creatures in the area must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:class] saving throw or take @Damage[(floor((@actor.level - 4)/3) + 2)d6[persistent,bleed]] damage.

For the duration of the effect, when a creature ends its turn in the area, it must attempt the saving throw again, and on a failed save, suffer @Damage[((floor((@actor.level - 4)/3) + 2)/2)d6[wind-ff]] damage. If they are no longer suffering from the persistent bleed damage, they instead begin to suffer from it again.
